definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
model or template character/written slogan or phrase/mention (e.g. "air mail" 航空 on a letter, "first draft" 初稿 on a document etc)
pattern/way of doing sth/trick/(sports) fancy-style (as figure skating etc)

sentences.english: Q. I am an MT4 user, how will my account be affected?
sentences.chinese: 我是一名MT4用户，我的账户会受到甚么样的影响？

sentences.english: Simple cysts are difficult to distinguish from arachnoid cyst or epidermoid.
sentences.chinese: 单纯的囊肿较难与蛛网膜囊肿和表皮样囊肿相鉴别。

sentences.english: If I attack you like this, how would you defend me?
sentences.chinese: 如果我咁样攻击你，你会点样挡隔？

sentences.english: Glucocorticoid plus CTX may be used to treat lupus-like hepatitis with caution.
sentences.chinese: 糖皮质激素联合CTX治疗狼疮样肝炎可以慎用。

sentences.english: No signs of influenza-like illness have been reported to date.
sentences.chinese: 迄今未报告流感样疾病的迹象。

sentences.english: But he can't say how much citrulline is needed to have Viagra-like effects.
sentences.chinese: 但他很难说需要多少瓜氨酸可以产生伟哥样作用。

sentences.english: I want to rent a small apartment for students.
sentences.chinese: Me想租1样适合于学生住白勺小套公寓。

sentences.english: Bubble lesions, plaque denudation , crater-shaped pits, reduced or disappeared microtriches on the surface of cysts were observed using scanning electron microscopy.
sentences.chinese: 扫描电镜可见蚴囊表面呈斑块状剥蚀及喷火口样凹陷。

sentences.english: Hareton, drive those dozen sheep into the barn porch.
sentences.chinese: 海尔顿，把这些样都赶到谷仓前的门廊去。

sentences.english: The tall blockhouse on the right used to be a jail for women.
sentences.chinese: 右手边这个碉堡样的建筑据说原来是关女囚的。

sentences.english: Conclusion The Niaochangshu capsule has the estrin type function.
sentences.chinese: 结论尿畅舒胶囊具有雌激素样作用。

sentences.english: What do you think of sunglasses?
sentences.chinese: 你认为太阳镜怎奈么样？
彗星样的行星会消失吗？

sentences.english: It usually starts with a cold-like infection.
sentences.chinese: 它的初始症状为一感冒样感染。

sentences.english: The number of cases with influenza-like illness appears much smaller than initially reported by the media.
sentences.chinese: 流感样疾病的病例数看来比媒体最初报道的要少得多。

sentences.english: The diagnosis relies on angiography , by which characteristic "string-of-beads" pattern may be found.
sentences.chinese: 诊断主要依靠动脉造影，可以发现特征性串珠样改变。

definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions
lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units
to be just like/can be compared to
